member.name: M:Toshiba.BN.DataAccess.FileAccess.DirectoryOperator.CreateDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Creates all directories and subdirectories in the input path

member.name: M:Toshiba.BN.DataAccess.FileAccess.DirectoryOperator.Delete(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes the specified directory and, if indicated, any subdirectories and files in the directory
member.param: (I) True to remove directories, subdirectories, and files in paths; otherwise, false

member.name: M:Toshiba.BN.DataAccess.FileAccess.DirectoryOperator.Exists(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the given path refers to an existing directory on disk
member.returns: (O) Return true if path refers to an existing directory; otherwise return false

member.name: M:Toshiba.BN.DataAccess.FileAccess.DirectoryOperator.GetDirectories(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the names of subdirectories (including their paths) in the specified directory
member.returns: (O) Return array of the full names (including paths) of subdirectories in the specified path

member.name: M:Toshiba.BN.DataAccess.FileAccess.DirectoryOperator.GetFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of files (including their paths) in the specified directory
member.returns: (O) Return array of the full names (including paths) for the files in the specified directory
